name: Cassadee
description: A Mage who is skilled at dealing AoE damage and imbuing buffs to allies.

ultimate.name: Running Tide
ultimate.description: Cassadee selects a direction and invokes a 3-tile-wide wave, dealing 280% damage to all enemies on the path and knocking them back for 2 tiles.

skill_1.name: Undercurrent
skill_1.description: Cassadee creates a water column beneath an enemy, knocking them up dealing 240% damage and stunning them for 1.5s.

skill_2.name: Tidal Strength
skill_2.description: Cassadee selects the nearest ally when a battle starts, granting them the blessing of Tidal Strength. She deals extra 60% magic damage to the enemy when the blessed ally hits them with normal attacks. The blessing vanishes after the above effect is triggered 9 times. Cassadee will bless this ally again after 9s, which can't be dispelled.

upgrades.upgrade: The extra damage is increased to 70%.
Cassadee reselects the nearest ally to grant blessing after the previously blessed ally is defeated. The blessing casting cooldown is reduced to 5s.
The extra damage is increased to 80%.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Cassadee increases her Haste by 12 during battle. She gains an extra 2 Haste while the first ally blessed by Tidal Strength in battle is alive.

upgrades.upgrade: Cassadee increases her Haste by 15 during battle. She gains an extra 4 Haste while the first ally blessed by Tidal Strength in battle is alive.
Cassadee increases her Haste by 18 during battle. She gains an extra 6 Haste while the first ally blessed by Tidal Strength in battle is alive.

ex_skill.name: Tidal Blessing
ex_skill.description: Running Tide grants all allied heroes on the path a temporary buff, empowering their next 6 normal attacks with the effect of Tidal Strength.

upgrades.upgrade: Extends the attempt of Tidal Strength effect obtained from the skill to 8 times.
When an enemy takes damage from Tidal Strength 6 times, they will be hit by Undercurrent once immediately.
The Tidal Strength effect obtained from this skill takes effect 9 times.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Cassadee reduces the Magic DEF of enemies hit by Running Tide by 20% for 10s.

season_skill.name: Energy Surge
season_skill.description: Recovers 90 energy every 3s after the battle starts until the first ultimate is cast.
